sub_title: MSc Supply Chain management @RSM | Social Media SA | BSc IEM @UTwente | Hobby pilot
summary:
Building bridges between technology and management with a Human Touch

Tamas is a highly motivated, goal-oriented, and enthusiastic industrial engineering student. He has an international, open attitude that drives him to get the best out of himself and expand his horizons. Thoroughly analyzing problems and coming up with innovative, original solutions he gains energy and satisfaction which further delivers results with added value. 

He was born in Serbia with Hungarian roots and lived most of his life as part of a minority, which fostered his cultural understanding and agility for dealing with people. He was raised bilingually in Hungarian and Serbian but decided to open to a more international environment and pursue a degree abroad in the Netherlands in industrial engineering. 

His ambitions are to make a sustainable impact on the world and collaborate interdisciplinarily. He is fascinated by using technology to improve manufacturing processes, and pave the future of sustainable and circular food supply chains.

treasury_media.title: A New Beginning
treasury_media.description:
Finally, despite this whole virus situation, I am ready to start up with my Bachelor in Industrial Engineering and Management at the University of Twente. 
An interesting fact about the University, that it has been nominated as the Best Technological University 2021, moreover the course is one of the six best-rated bachelor programs at the university.

school.name: Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University

awards.title: Finalist of the 2023 BCG Strategy Cup
awards.description: The BCG Strategy Cup is a well-established and prestigious case-solving competition, where the best 32 students experience the life of a consultant for a weekend in a short but intense real-life business simulation. This year "Green Innovation" was the main theme of the competition which included setting up a business model and market entry plan for a "client" in the industry of self-autonomous cars.

awards.title: Global Finalist and Winner of the Dutch Regional Finals of the "Inovathon" Marathon 2022
awards.description:
The greatest international global logistics innovation marathon you have ever seen. Inovathon is our innovation, logistics, and sustainability marathon. It’s all of these things rolled into one. It’s a space for development, learning, networking, and letting off steam, an irresistible and unforgettable place.
https://www.inovathonscania.com/en

awards.title: Finalist of The Negotiation World Championship 2022
awards.description: Negotiation World Championship 2022 have been the largest (50 teams from world's best business and law schools), the most diverse (participants from all continents) and  probably among the difficult in the history of The Negotiation Challenge! 3 negotiation simulations were designed that tested a broad spectrum of the participants' negotiation intelligence and required a balance between trust and relationship building and value engineering.

awards.title: Global Finalist of the Fresh Connection Supply Chain Simulation Competition 2022
awards.description: What started as a university course project led us to the finals of the student Fresh Connection challenge. First getting into the top 20 percent of all teams and competing in a semi-final qualification round (in December). There we managed to secure ourselves spot 4 out of 8 (Q1) that made it to the finals. The finals consisted of 39 teams combined from the winners of the qualification rounds. During the finals, we were challenged for 5 days in 3 rounds, with different supply chain issues and disasters. Even though the challenges were tough, we managed to leave half of the participants behind us and mark us at spot 17 out of 39. It was a very valuable experience both professionally and individually in our team.

projects.title: University project with Fresh n’Rebel
projects.description:
The aim of this project was to create a more sustainable headphones product/portfolio extension for Fresh n’ Rebel B.V. This project was conducted with three different disciplines, namely Mechanical (ME) engineers, Industrial Design (IDE) engineers and Industrial process (IEM) engineers. My contribution to this project as leader and IEM student was the following:
- Green business process model 
- Enterprise Input-Output Model with flow diagram 
- market research on idea and product

profile_positions.title: Graduation Intern

profile_positions.description: Green Talks - Sustainability Podcast for UT researchers, students, and staff
profile_positions.title: Podcast Host and Producer

profile_positions.description:
The Research and Education Green Officers are responsible for:
• Contributing to the integration of sustainability into education and research
• Designing, collating, and managing a university-wide sustainability intelligence system of centrally accessible information on sustainability research and education at UT
• Promoting ‘action research’ and challenge-based
• Collective inquiry challenges with a societal impact that further embeds the campus community in its social environment.

This Green Officer takes an active role in tapping into the wealth of knowledge related to sustainability and circularity at UT, and therefore also builds a network of researchers connected to the Green Hub to facilitate cross-pollination.

UT Eco-challenge Collaborator
4TU - Rethink Waste Challenge - Circularity Roadshow

volunteer_experiences.description:
Enactus is a worldwide community of student, academic and business leaders committed to using the power of entrepreneurial action to transform lives and shape a better more sustainable world. www.enactus.nl (Enactus Netherlands) www.enactus.org (Enactus Worldwide)

Enactus x EY Mentorship Program
FutureProof Incubator Program

The Business Days Twente's goal is to organize a range of activities to promote the exchange between students, graduates, and research assistants on one side and potential employers on the other side. To achieve this goal each year approximately 150 companies and nearly 3000 students and recently graduated students get to know each other during several activities organised by the Business Days Twente.

My tasks were:
- coordination of companies and students during the carrier fair (March 2&3)

Startup Maffia is a community of young professionals that aim to promote entrepreneurship through events and informal panel meetings.

I joined the organization to help execute their 45th meeting the 2nd annual entrepreneurial picnic in Budapest during august 2022.
